short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leave comments with ASCII arts upon approving pull requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leave comments with ASCII arts upon approving pull requests on GitHub.

Instead of having a plain "LGMT" or "SHIP IT" message upon approving a PR on GitHub, this extension enables you to add ASCII arts to your Approval Comments!

Usage:
1- Open any pull request in GitHub that you would like to approve.
2- Click the "SHIP IT!" button that appears next to the "Merge pull request" button.

Is the "SHIP IT!" button missing? refresh the pull request page.
